attributes.additional_details: Anjem Choudrey is a radical hate preacher who is  a major threat to this country and should be deported immediately along with his family and supporters to a muslim country where he says he would love to live! No more should the UK taxpayers  pay for him and family to live here, supporting him while he does not intend to work, instead is allowed to preach his vile hate on our streets with  impunity  and be allowed to radicalise young people the likes of Lee Rigbys killers

rejection.details: Mr Choudary is a British citizen
